channel.title: Comments on: Trying Anonymous Comments
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
You can login to the blog first and then comment. You login from the blog's main page.
I don't know about the 'nofollow'. That's a good question. I guess we'll see when the first comments are made (I can test it, but I'm lazy :)
item.content:encoded:
You can login to the blog first and then comment. You login from the blog’s main page.

I don’t know about the ‘nofollow’. That’s a good question. I guess we’ll see when the first comments are made (I can test it, but I’m lazy :)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: What about named comments? How do i do that? BTW, is there 'nofollow' attribute?
item.content:encoded: What about named comments? How do i do that? BTW, is there ‘nofollow’ attribute?
